title: Create an ErrorBoundary for a Route

path.description: The path to route file relative to the project root.

nameAndDirectoryFormat.description: Whether to generate the error boundary in the path as provided, relative to the current working directory and ignoring the project (`as-provided`) or generate it using the project and directory relative to the workspace root (`derived`).

project.x-prompt: What project contains the route file that this ErrorBoundary is for?
project.x-deprecated: Provide the `path` option instead and use the `as-provided` format. The project will be determined from the path provided. It will be removed in Nx v18.

apiVersion.description: Which version of the ErrorBoundary convention to use for the route.
